header.title: Patient Journey
header.subtitle: Your structured guide to coordinated medical care across borders. We support you at every step of your healthcare journey.

intro.title: Patient Journey with MedEminence
intro.desc: We facilitate your medical journey through structured, transparent support at every stage.

steps.personalizedNote: Each patient's journey is personalized based on medical needs, destination choice, and individual circumstances.

items.title: Initial Enquiry & Medical Information Submission
items.desc: Patients securely share medical reports and treatment requirements through our enquiry form.

items.title: Case Review Coordination
items.desc: Medical details are shared with appropriate partner hospitals and specialists for evaluation.

items.title: Treatment Pathway & Travel Support
items.desc: We assist with treatment planning logistics, travel coordination, and hospital accommodation.

items.title: Care Coordination & Follow-Up Support
items.desc: On-ground assistance during treatment and coordination of post-treatment follow-up communication.

benefits.title: Why Choose MedEminence Patient Journey?
benefits.subtitle: Experience the advantages of a structured medical journey with transparency and full support.

items.title: Structured and ethical healthcare facilitation
items.desc: Organized approach to international healthcare journeys.

items.title: Collaboration with accredited hospitals
items.desc: Partnership with accredited hospitals and licensed professionals.

items.title: Transparent, non-clinical coordination model
items.desc: Clear separation between medical decision-making and facilitation services.

items.title: Patient-focused communication and support
items.desc: Continuous support and personalized care throughout the journey.

items.title: Travel and accommodation coordination
items.desc: Assistance with travel planning and accommodation arrangements near hospitals.

items.title: Post-treatment follow-up
items.desc: Coordination of follow-up consultations and medical report sharing after discharge.

faq.title: Patient Journey FAQs
faq.moreQuestions: Have more questions about the patient journey?

items.q: What is the first step in the patient journey?
items.a: The first step is submitting medical information through our enquiry form to share medical reports and treatment requirements.

items.q: How are hospitals and specialists selected?
items.a: Based on the patient's medical needs, we coordinate with accredited hospitals and qualified medical professionals for case evaluation.

items.q: Do you provide travel and accommodation support?
items.a: Yes, we assist with travel planning and accommodation arrangements near hospitals for patients and accompanying family members.

items.q: What happens after treatment is completed?
items.a: We provide post-treatment follow-up support, including coordination of follow-up consultations and medical report sharing.

items.q: Does MedEminence provide medical advice or diagnosis?
items.a: No, MedEminence does not provide medical diagnosis, prescriptions, or treatment. All clinical decisions are determined exclusively by licensed healthcare providers.

cta.title: Start Your Medical Journey with MedEminence
cta.description: Our structured patient journey ensures you receive timely, coordinated medical care with comprehensive support at every step.

timeline.title: Journey Timeline
timeline.hospitalAdmission: Hospital Admission: As per treatment schedule
